title: Good Deeds Global
text:
Good Deeds Global was an Internet-based <a href="social%20business">social business</a>, and <a href="social%20movement">social movement</a> organization structured around the "pay it forward" and "good deeds" concept.
Business model.
The Good Deeds Global company had a unique hybrid <a href="business%20model">business model</a> utilizing the <a href="philanthropy">philanthropy</a> aspect of a charity organization integrated into an online business that was supported by a grassroots social movement spearheaded by its founders.
The Good Deeds Global website offered a variety of free services to its users that included a <a href="social%20networking%20service">social networking service</a> called "Your Life", and a wish granting out-reach service called "Request A Good Deed".
Impact.
Social movement.
The Founder of Good Deeds Global <a href="Corey%20Shoblom%20Davis">Corey Shoblom Davis</a> along with Co-Founder Ken Melancon have been seen in a variety of cities throughout the <a href="United%20States">United States</a> handing out various amounts of free money to people in an effort to promote and encourage the <a href="pay%20it%20forward">pay it forward</a> philosophy, in addition to supporting the <a href="random%20act%20of%20kindness">random act of kindness</a> concept.
